resources: DataCamp Data Preprocessing Track (Introduction & Data Cleaning)
Review NumPy and Pandas basics related to data manipulation
roadmap.outcome: Understand core data preprocessing techniques (handling missing values, data type conversion) and refresh foundational knowledge of NumPy and Pandas for data manipulation.

resources: DataCamp Data Preprocessing Track (Feature Scaling & Encoding Categorical Data)
Explore libraries like Scikit-learn for preprocessing tasks
roadmap.outcome: Implement feature scaling (normalization, standardization) and handle categorical data (one-hot encoding, label encoding) using Scikit-learn.

roadmap.focus: Mini Project: Data Preprocessing Pipeline for a Regression Task
resources: Kaggle: Find a regression dataset (e.g., house price prediction)
Implement a complete data preprocessing pipeline using Pandas and Scikit-learn
roadmap.outcome: Build a functional data preprocessing pipeline for a regression problem, including data cleaning, feature engineering, and scaling.

resources: Research different model deployment options (Flask, FastAPI, AWS SageMaker, Google Cloud AI Platform)
Choose a framework (start with Flask for simplicity)
roadmap.outcome: Understand the landscape of model deployment and choose a suitable framework for simple deployments (Flask).

roadmap.focus: Deploying a Simple Model with Flask
resources: Tutorials on deploying machine learning models with Flask
roadmap.outcome: Deploy a simple machine learning model (e.g., a linear regression model) using Flask to a local server.

resources: Learn to containerize your Flask application and model.
roadmap.outcome: Containerize your Flask application and deployed model using Docker for consistent deployment environments.

resources: Explore open-source ML projects on GitHub
roadmap.outcome: Identify a real-world machine learning project that aligns with your interests and skillset. Scope out potential tasks to improve upon or build an extension.

roadmap.focus: Real-World Project Implementation (Data Acquisition & Initial Preprocessing)
resources: Selected real-world project dataset or API
Implement data acquisition and initial preprocessing steps for the project
roadmap.outcome: Acquire the necessary data for your chosen real-world project and perform initial data preprocessing (cleaning, handling missing values).
